level.text: For each loan issued under this subchapter, the Mayor shall arrange a repayment schedule.
Each loan granted from the fund shall be recorded as a lien against the real and personal property of the applicant.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 7-220
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 7-220, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 7-2001.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Because of the codification of D.C. Law 12-215 as subchapter II of this chapter, the designation of the preexisting text as subchapter I, "subchapter" has been substituted for "chapter" in subsection (a).
